name: Pixel 8
description:
Welcome to the Pixel 8 gallery where you can test your dexterity and artistic eye against the clock to claim your golden pixel prize. Recreate hundreds of pixel masterpieces against the clock! Fill a few minutes waiting for the train, or lose an entire journey as you explore the Pixel 8 exhibit halls and fill your bank with pixels to spend!

- 450 priceless pixeltastic levels to enjoy!

- Easy to pick up, difficult to become a master!

- Create and share your own Pixel 8 creations with your friends via Facebook or Twitter and it could find its way into a Fan pack in a future update

- Buy new themed galleries to continue your artistic renaissance

- Game Center leaderboards and achievements

- Toddler mode to let your kids play at their own pace... Without spending your money!



- iCloud Progress Sync

- iOS 8.0, 7.0 and 6.0 Compatible

- In-Game Multi-Language Support: English, French, Spanish, Danish & Russian.


***Any purchase in game will remove adverts and grants you the teams eternal thanks and love.


Praise for Pixel 8
--------------------------------
"There's something oddly satisfying about getting every pixel and every colour exactly right" - Pocket Gamer

"It's a clever little concept, I must admit" - Touch Arcade


Awards and Achievements
--------------------------------
